wikipedia_page.main: Lucy Hope (born 30 January 1997) is a Scottish swimmer. She competed in the women's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 2018 European Aquatics Championships, winning the gold medal. She won a further four gold medals in the 2020 European Aquatics Championships in the women's 4 x 100 metre freestyle relay and the mixed 4 x 200 metre freestyle relay
